title: Response to a letter to the editor, “Studying the incidence of thyroid cancer in Ecuador: 2016–2021”
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Elius Paz-Cruz, Santiago Cadena-Ullauri, Patricia Guevara-Ramírez, Viviana A. Ruiz-Pozo, Rafael Tamayo-Trujillo, Daniel Simancas-Racines, Ana Karina Zambrano
